description:
This small vocabulary is intended to extend [Atom OWL](/sun/awol).

Currently covers:
  - [Atom Threading Extensions](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4685.txt)
  - [Feed Paging and Archiving](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5005.txt)

No plans:
  - [Atom License Extension](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4946.txt); use `xhv:license` instead.
name: AtomOwl Vocabulary Specification Extentions
